JobFullDesc:
The North America Applied Analytics team powers Nike Direct growth through analysis & optimization of the 365 consumer journey & digital platform experiences; orchestrates member-led product selection & lifecycle optimization; identifies member growth cohorts; maps inventory levels to cohort demand to mitigate sell-out risk and optimize inventory sell-thru; spearheads an always-on testing & experimentation offense across both stores and digital experiences; delivers Voice of the Consumer (VOC) feedback and foundational Customer Service Analytics through the consumer lens.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR
We’re looking for a North America SNKRS App Insights Manger. The continued success of our Digital business hinges on making well-informed business decisions from insights delivered by this role. The ideal candidate will be passionate about understanding consumer behaviors, and gifted at translating complex analytics into concise stories for the business. This role is ideal if you are motivated; comfortable working with ambiguity, and relish the opportunity to work cross functionally taking on complicated business problems. If you are attuned to trends related to digital retail businesses and how to best integrate analytical and data driven findings into the business, this is a great role for you! Your experience helps you to understand how to work with large, sometimes unstructured data sets, and have expertise in data visualization packages and tools.

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON
Your day-to-day work will involve being a “data detective” and consumer advocate for our business. You’ll collaborate with Digital leadership to deliver insights and recommendations on the best path to better serve our Nike Digital consumers and their evolving needs. Typical tasks including driving digital growth through channel-level analysis and optimization of the SNKRS App, monitoring the app health to outline opportunities and risks, and developing new solutions and insights to empower the digital business organizations to action and innovation. You are integral in building an end-to-end consumer view and deliver recommendations that optimize our ecosystem consumer-journey spanning both online and offline. Additionally, you will deliver solutions and education that will provide self-service analytics; to drive scalable and sustainable impact from the organizations analytical capabilities.

WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH
You will sit within the centralized Analytics & Insights function and serve as the North America SNKRS App subject matter authority, working under the Director of Nike Platform Analytics. You’ll partner with SNKRS App leaders, to help that team build, deliver, & optimize a best in class SNKRS App experience for our consumers. You’ll also partner closely with multi-functional analytics team to create and implement scalable insights to drive consumer engagement and growth in North America.
